example.content.editorialblog
Interface Blog

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlogPolicy
public interface Blog

Interface representing a Blog.

Method Summary
 BlogMonth getBlogMonth(int year, int month)
          Finds the BlogMonth representing the given year and the given month, if one exists.
 BlogPosting getBlogPosting(com.polopoly.cm.ContentId contentId)
          Returns the BlogPosting represented by the given content id, or null if the content id does not represent a posting.
 BlogYear getBlogYear(int year)
          Finds the BlogYear representing the given year, if one exists.
 java.util.List<BlogYear> getBlogYears()
          Returns a list of BlogYears for which this blog has postings.
 java.util.List<com.polopoly.cm.ContentId> getLatestPostingIds()
          Returns a list containing content ids of the latest BlogPostings in this blog.
 java.util.List<com.polopoly.cm.ContentId> getLatestPostingIds(int limit)
          Returns a list containing content ids of the latest BlogPostings in this blog, with a maximum size of the given limit.
 

Method Detail

getBlogMonth

BlogMonth getBlogMonth(int year,
                       int month)
Finds the BlogMonth representing the given year and the given month, if one exists.

Parameters:
year - the year the blog month is for, e.g. 2008
month - the month the blog month is for. The first month of the year is 0 (JANUARY).
Returns:
the month, if it exists in the blog. Otherwise null.
See Also:
GregorianCalendar

getBlogPosting

BlogPosting getBlogPosting(com.polopoly.cm.ContentId contentId)
                           throws com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException
Returns the BlogPosting represented by the given content id, or null if the content id does not represent a posting.

Parameters:
contentId - the content id representing the posting
Returns:
the posting
Throws:
com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException - if an error occurs

getBlogYear

BlogYear getBlogYear(int year)
Finds the BlogYear representing the given year, if one exists.

Parameters:
year - the year the blog year is for
Returns:
the year, if it exists in the blog. Otherwise null.
See Also:
GregorianCalendar

getBlogYears

java.util.List<BlogYear> getBlogYears()
                                      throws com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException
Returns a list of BlogYears for which this blog has postings.

Returns:
the list of years
Throws:
com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException - if an error occurs

getLatestPostingIds

java.util.List<com.polopoly.cm.ContentId> getLatestPostingIds()
                                                              throws com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException
Returns a list containing content ids of the latest BlogPostings in this blog. Will return a maximum of 100 postings by default.

Returns:
the list of posting content ids
Throws:
com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException - if an error occurs

getLatestPostingIds

java.util.List<com.polopoly.cm.ContentId> getLatestPostingIds(int limit)
                                                              throws com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException
Returns a list containing content ids of the latest BlogPostings in this blog, with a maximum size of the given limit.

Parameters:
limit - the maximum number of postings to return
Returns:
the list of posting content ids
Throws:
com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException - if an error occurs
